focusMode.focusModeDescription: Focus mode will improve your productivity for a fixed amount of time. During this time, you can only open the apps available on the home screen.
focusMode.disableFocusModeDescription: Are you sure you want to disable focus mode?

homeScreen.title: Home Screen
homeScreen.showOnlyFavouriteApps: Show only favourite apps on home screen
homeScreen.showDialerButton: Show dialer button on home screen

focusMode.title: Focus Mode
focusMode.description: Set the timer for the focus mode. When the timer runs out, the focus mode will be disabled and you can open any app again.
focusMode.showFocusModeButton: Show focus mode button on home screen

phoneUsage.title: Phone Usage
phoneUsage.description: Set the preferred amount of time you want to spend on your phone daily.

restrictedApps.title: Restricted Apps
restrictedApps.description: The access for these app is restricted. You have to wait a fixed amount of time for these apps to boot up.

restrictedApp.title: Restricted App
restrictedApp.description: This app won't open until the timer runs out. You can change the timer settings in the option menu

errors.networkError:
Network error.
Please try again later
errors.locationAccessDenied: Localization access is denied. Please enable it to view weather forecast
errors.locationServiceDisabled: Localization service is disabled, please enable it to view weather forecast

page1.title: Welcome!
page1.subtitle: MiniLauncher is a simple and lightweight launcher for Android devices. It is designed to be fast and easy to use, with a clean and minimalistic interface.

page3.title: Select the apps you want to be displayed on the home screen.

page4.title: Grant Minilauncher location access to view live weather forecast data.

page5.title: Now set MiniLauncher as your default launcher and enjoy!

page6.title: You're all set!
page6.subtitle: Now you can start to use your new launcher!
